text: Hospodi is a studio album by the Polish black metal band Batushka, released on July 12, 2019 through Metal Blade Records. It was released under the guidance of Bartłomiej "Bart" Krysiuk, and it is one of two records released under the name "Batushka" in 2019, the other one being Panihida, which was written and recorded by Krzysztof "Derph" Drabikowski. These competing releases come as a result of a falling out and subsequent legal dispute between Drabikowski and Krysiuk over control and ownership of the band and the "Batushka" name. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |} ==Personnel== * Варфоломей – lead vocals, producer * Paweł Jaroszewicz – drums == See also == * List of number-one albums of 2019 (Poland) ==References== Category:2019 albums Category:Metal Blade Records albums
title: Hospodi
